mapper.select: select CATEGORYNAME from CATEGORY_TBL where CATEGORYNO=#{cateNo}

select CategoryNo,CategoryName,totalIncome,totalSpend,monthNo from (select nvl(sum(accountbookSpend),0) totalSpend , nvl(sum(accountbookIncome),0) totalIncome , CategoryNo, to_char(min(accountbookRegDate),'MM') monthNo from accountbook_tbl join category_tbl using (CategoryNo) where category_tbl.groupNo=#{groupNo} and CategoryNo=#{categoryNo} and accountbookRegDate between #{startDay} and #{lastDay} group by CategoryNo) join category_tbl using (CategoryNo)

select nvl(TAGNO,0) tagNo from (select ROWNUM rnum, TAGNO, tagDate from (select tagDate, TAGNO from (select * from accountbook_tbl join accountbook_tag_tbl using (accountbookNo) where groupNo = #{groupNo})tmp join tag_tbl using (tagNo) order by tagNo desc)) where rnum = 1

select tagNo,tagName from (select TAGNO from (select tagNo from accountbook_tbl join accountbook_tag_tbl using (accountbookNo) where groupNo = #{groupNo}) join tag_tbl using (tagNo) group by tagNo) join tag_tbl using (tagNo) order by tagNo desc
select count(*) from (select tagNo from (select * from accountbook_tbl join accountbook_tag_tbl using (accountbookNo) where groupNo = #{groupNo}) join tag_tbl using (tagNo) group by tagNo)

select tagNo from (select ROWNUM rnum,tagNo from (select tagNo from (select * from accountbook_tbl join accountbook_tag_tbl using (accountbookNo) where groupNo=#{groupNo}) join tag_tbl using (tagNo) group by tagNo order by tagNo desc)) where rnum between #{startRnum} and #{endRnum}
